abstract.t:
This report lists those hosts which provide any of these "little" TCP services:
Port (in decimal) Service ----------------- ------- 7 Echo 9 Discard 11 Active Users (systat) 13 Date and Time in printable form 15 Netstat 17 Quote of the Day 19 Character Generator (ttytst) 37 Time (32 bits) 79 Finger
